name: covid19-passbook-generator
description: A simple PWA to scan your EU digital COVID Certificate and generate a passbook from it
author: Thibault Milan <hello@thibaultmilan.com>

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npx parcel serve src/index.html --https && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
scripts.deploy-preview: NODE_ENV=development npx parcel build src/index.html && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npx parcel build src/index.html && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
